analysis.description:
Reentrancy in PreICO.safeWithdrawal (/unique_chucks/11/0x1fe7a92013b295ff98da0954b7a08e603754a1bf.sol#198-225):
	External calls:
	- notaryToken.takeBackNTRY(recoveryAccount,msg.sender,rewardsLedger[msg.sender].NTRY) (/unique_chucks/11/0x1fe7a92013b295ff98da0954b7a08e603754a1bf.sol#210-211)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.send(rewardsLedger[msg.sender].amount) (/unique_chucks/11/0x1fe7a92013b295ff98da0954b7a08e603754a1bf.sol#204-212)
	- beneficiary.send(amountRaised) (/unique_chucks/11/0x1fe7a92013b295ff98da0954b7a08e603754a1bf.sol#214-223)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- returnFunds (/unique_chucks/11/0x1fe7a92013b295ff98da0954b7a08e603754a1bf.sol#222)
reward in PreICO.addBonuses (/unique_chucks/11/0x1fe7a92013b295ff98da0954b7a08e603754a1bf.sol#120) is a local variable never initialiazed

PreICO.safeWithdrawal (/unique_chucks/11/0x1fe7a92013b295ff98da0954b7a08e603754a1bf.sol#198-225) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-notaryToken.takeBackNTRY(recoveryAccount,msg.sender,rewardsLedger[msg.sender].NTRY) (/unique_chucks/11/0x1fe7a92013b295ff98da0954b7a08e603754a1bf.sol#210-211)

Reentrancy in PreICO.fallback (/unique_chucks/11/0x1fe7a92013b295ff98da0954b7a08e603754a1bf.sol#75-89):
	External calls:
	- notaryToken.transferFrom(owner,msg.sender,amount) (/unique_chucks/11/0x1fe7a92013b295ff98da0954b7a08e603754a1bf.sol#80-89)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- amountRaised (/unique_chucks/11/0x1fe7a92013b295ff98da0954b7a08e603754a1bf.sol#81-82)
	- contributions (/unique_chucks/11/0x1fe7a92013b295ff98da0954b7a08e603754a1bf.sol#82-83)
	- rewardsLedger (/unique_chucks/11/0x1fe7a92013b295ff98da0954b7a08e603754a1bf.sol#82-83)
